options.label: LED indicator lights 1 second after opening
LED indicator lights 1 second after closing
LED indicator lights 1 second after opening and closing

metadata.inclusion: Using a paper clip, push the button for over 3 seconds. The status LED turns off after successful inclusion.
metadata.exclusion: Using a paper clip, push the button for over 3 seconds. The status LED starts flashing after successful removal.
metadata.reset: Using a paper clip, push the button for over 10 seconds.
